verses.verse: <S%G2532>The<s%> <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4523>Sadducees<s%> <S%G4334>came,<s%> and <S%G3985>testing<s%> <S%G1905>him,<s%> asked <S%G846>him<s%> to <S%G1925>show<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> a <S%G4592>sign<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G3772>heaven.<s%>

But he <S%G611>answered<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G2036>"When<s%> it <S%G1096>is<s%> <S%G3798>evening,<s%> you <S%G2036>say,<s%> <S%G2105><s%> 'It will be fair weather, <S%G1063>for<s%> the <S%G3772>sky<s%> is <S%G4449>red.<s%>'

<S%G2532>In<s%> the <S%G4404>morning,<s%> <S%G5494><s%> 'It will be foul weather <S%G4594>today,<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> the <S%G3772>sky<s%> is <S%G4449>red<s%> and <S%G4768>threatening.<s%>' <S%G5273>Hypocrites!<s%> You <S%G1097>know<s%> how to <S%G1252>discern<s%> the <S%G4383>appearance<s%> of the <S%G3772>sky,<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G1410>you<s%> <S%G3756>can't<s%> discern the <S%G4592>signs<s%> of the <S%G2540>times!<s%>

An <S%G4190>evil<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3428>adulterous<s%> <S%G1074>generation<s%> seeks <S%G1934>after<s%> a <S%G4592>sign,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> there <S%G1325>will<s%> be <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G4592>sign<s%> <S%G1325>given<s%> to <S%G1487>it,<s%> <S%G3361>except<s%> the <S%G4592>sign<s%> of the <S%G4396>prophet<s%> <S%G2495>Jonah.<s%>" <S%G2532>He<s%> <S%G2641>left<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> and <S%G565>departed.<s%>
<S%G846>The<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> the other <S%G4008>side<s%> and had <S%G1950>forgotten<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2983>take<s%> <S%G740>bread.<s%>

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to <S%G846>them,<s%> "Take <S%G3708>heed<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4337>beware<s%> <S%G575>of<s%> the <S%G2219>yeast<s%> of the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4523>Sadducees.<s%>"
<S%G1161>They<s%> <S%G1260>reasoned<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G1438>themselves,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G3754>"We<s%> <S%G2983>brought<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G740>bread.<s%>"

<S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> <S%G1097>perceiving<s%> <S%G2036>it,<s%> said, "Why do <S%G846>you<s%> reason <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G1438>yourselves,<s%> you of little <S%G3640>faith,<s%> <S%G3754><s%> 'because <S%G1260>you<s%> have <S%G2983>brought<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G740>bread?<s%>'

<S%G3539>Don't<s%> you <S%G3539>yet<s%> <S%G3539>perceive,<s%> <S%G3761>neither<s%> <S%G3421>remember<s%> <S%G740>the<s%> <S%G4002>five<s%> <S%G740>loaves<s%> for the five <S%G4000>thousand,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> how <S%G4214>many<s%> <S%G2894>baskets<s%> you took <S%G2983>up?<s%>
<S%G3761>Nor<s%> <S%G740>the<s%> <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G740>loaves<s%> for the four <S%G5070>thousand,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> how <S%G4214>many<s%> <S%G4711>baskets<s%> you took <S%G2983>up?<s%>

How is it <S%G4459>that<s%> <S%G3539>you<s%> <S%G3756>don't<s%> <S%G3539>perceive<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> I <S%G3756>didn't<s%> <S%G2036>speak<s%> to <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G4012>concerning<s%> <S%G740>bread?<s%> But <S%G4337>beware<s%> <S%G575>of<s%> the <S%G2219>yeast<s%> of the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4523>Sadducees.<s%>"

<S%G5119>Then<s%> <S%G4920>they<s%> understood <S%G3754>that<s%> he <S%G3756>didn't<s%> <S%G2036>tell<s%> them to <S%G4337>beware<s%> <S%G575>of<s%> the <S%G2219>yeast<s%> of <S%G740>bread,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G575>of<s%> the <S%G1322>teaching<s%> of the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4523>Sadducees.<s%>

Now <S%G1161>when<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G3313>parts<s%> of <S%G2542>Caesarea<s%> <S%G5376>Philippi,<s%> he <S%G2065>asked<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G5101>"Who<s%> <S%G3004>do<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> say <S%G3004>that<s%> <S%G3165>I,<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>Man,<s%> <S%G1511>am?<s%>"

They <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G3303>"Some<s%> <S%G2036>say<s%> <S%G2491>John<s%> the <S%G910>Baptizer,<s%> <S%G3303>some,<s%> <S%G2243>Elijah,<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G2087>others,<s%> <S%G2408>Jeremiah,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> of the <S%G4396>prophets.<s%>"
<S%G4613>Simon<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G611>answered,<s%> <S%G4771>"You<s%> <S%G1488>are<s%> the <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>the<s%> <S%G2198>living<s%> <S%G2316>God.<s%>"

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G3107>"Blessed<s%> are <S%G1488>you,<s%> <S%G4613>Simon<s%> Bar <S%G2495>Jonah,<s%> <S%G3754>for<s%> <S%G4561>flesh<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G129>blood<s%> <S%G601>has<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G601>revealed<s%> this to <S%G4671>you,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3962>Father<s%> who <S%G3588>is<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3772>heaven.<s%>

<S%G2504>I<s%> <S%G2504>also<s%> <S%G3004>tell<s%> <S%G4671>you<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G4671>you<s%> <S%G1488>are<s%> <S%G4074>Peter,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G4073>rock<s%> I will <S%G3618>build<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G1577>assembly,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G4439>gates<s%> of <S%G86>Hades<s%> <S%G2729>will<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> prevail <S%G2729>against<s%> <S%G846>it.<s%>

<S%G2532>I<s%> will <S%G1325>give<s%> to <S%G4671>you<s%> the <S%G2807>keys<s%> of the <S%G932>Kingdom<s%> of <S%G3772>Heaven,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1437>whatever<s%> you <S%G1210>bind<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G1093>earth<s%> will have <S%G2071>been<s%> <S%G1210>bound<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3772>heaven;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1437>whatever<s%> you <S%G3089>release<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G1093>earth<s%> will have <S%G2071>been<s%> <S%G3089>released<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3772>heaven.<s%>"

<S%G5119>Then<s%> <S%G1291>he<s%> commanded <S%G846>the<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> they should <S%G2036>tell<s%> no <S%G3367>one<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G2076>was<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> the <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>

<S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G4355>took<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G756>aside,<s%> and began to <S%G2008>rebuke<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G2436>"Far<s%> be it from <S%G4671>you,<s%> <S%G2962>Lord!<s%> <S%G5124>This<s%> <S%G2071>will<s%> <S%G3756>never<s%> <S%G2071>be<s%> done to <S%G4671>you.<s%>"

<S%G1161>But<s%> he <S%G4762>turned,<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%> to <S%G4074>Peter,<s%> "Get <S%G3694>behind<s%> <S%G3450>me,<s%> <S%G4567>Satan!<s%> <S%G5217>You<s%> <S%G1488>are<s%> a <S%G4625>stumbling<s%> block to <S%G3450>me,<s%> <S%G3754>for<s%> you are <S%G3756>not<s%> setting your <S%G5426>mind<s%> on the things <S%G3588>of<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> on the <S%G3588>things<s%> of <S%G444>men.<s%>"

<S%G5119>Then<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G3101>to<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> <S%G1487>"If<s%> <S%G5100>anyone<s%> <S%G2309>desires<s%> to <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G3694>after<s%> <S%G3450>me,<s%> let him <S%G533>deny<s%> <S%G1438>himself,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> take <S%G142>up<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4716>cross,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G190>follow<s%> <S%G3427>me.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G3739>whoever<s%> <S%G2309>desires<s%> to <S%G4982>save<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5590>life<s%> will <S%G622>lose<s%> <S%G846>it,<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G3739>whoever<s%> will <S%G622>lose<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5590>life<s%> <S%G1752>for<s%> <S%G1700>my<s%> <S%G1752>sake<s%> will <S%G2147>find<s%> <S%G846>it.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G5623>will<s%> it <S%G5623>profit<s%> a <S%G444>man,<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> he <S%G2770>gains<s%> <S%G2889>the<s%> <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G2889>world,<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G2210>forfeits<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5590>life?<s%> <S%G2228>Or<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G1325>will<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G1325>give<s%> in <S%G465>exchange<s%> <S%G5590>for<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5590>life?<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>Man<s%> <S%G3195>will<s%> <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G1391>glory<s%> <S%G3962>of<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G32>angels,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5119>then<s%> he will <S%G591>render<s%> to <S%G1538>everyone<s%> according <S%G2596>to<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4234>deeds.<s%>

Most <S%G281>certainly<s%> I <S%G3004>tell<s%> <S%G5213>you,<s%> there <S%G1526>are<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> <S%G2476>standing<s%> <S%G5602>here<s%> <S%G3748>who<s%> <S%G1089>will<s%> in <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G3756>way<s%> <S%G1089>taste<s%> of <S%G2288>death,<s%> <S%G2193>until<s%> they <S%G1492>see<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>Man<s%> <S%G2064>coming<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G932>Kingdom.<s%>"
